data.client_settings: Discord PTB Build Number 11827 (Version Hash: 0ca594515d14a144ac9755c4ce0b2f399d60edac) / Discord Canary Build Number 11842 (Version Hash: 75b409e3eab0b2f27d20e162121f5f011193e014)
data.actual_result: The roles will have the same color as the first mentioned role, until you switch channels
data.expected_result: Both roles should show their appropriate colors
data.short_description: Mentioning Multiple Roles separately in the Channel Topic shows the wrong color until you switch the channel
data.steps_to_repro: - mention one colored role in the channel topic you are viewing - save, look at the channel - now mention another colored role in the same topic, before the other role
